es.ucm.fdi.gaia.recolibry.implementations.mahout.cfUser

Class MahoutUserSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.gaia.recolibry.implementations.mahout.cfUser.MahoutUserSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.common.Refreshable, org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.similarity.UserSimilarity

    public class MahoutUserSimilarity
extends Object
implements org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.similarity.UserSimilarity
    Class to select the similarity function to apply in the RecommenderMahoutCFUser. There are 7 functions to select: CityBlock, Euclidean, LogLike, Pearson, Spearman, Tanimoto nad UncenteredCosine.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jose L. Jorro-Aragoneses
